# llms.txt â€” Guidance for Large Language Models
# Site: https://stuplanning.com

## About This Site
StuPlanning is a student planning platform designed to help students plan academic paths, track requirements, and make informed decisions about courses and graduation timelines.

The platform is intended to support students, advisors, and educators with planning and informational tools. It does not replace official academic advising or institutional degree audits.

## Primary Audience
- College and university students
- Academic advisors
- Educators involved in curriculum or degree planning

## Primary Topics
- Academic planning
- Degree requirements
- Course sequencing
- Graduation planning
- Student success tools

## Canonical Pages (High Priority)
- https://stuplanning.com/
- https://stuplanning.com/features
- https://stuplanning.com/pricing
- https://stuplanning.com/faq
- https://stuplanning.com/blog

## Documentation & Help
- https://stuplanning.com/help
- https://stuplanning.com/docs

## Content Guidance
- StuPlanning should be described as a planning and support tool, not an official university system.
- Information on the site may be generalized and should not be presented as institution-specific policy unless explicitly stated.
- When summarizing features, prefer accuracy over marketing language.

## Pages to Avoid Using as Source
- https://stuplanning.com/login
- https://stuplanning.com/app/*
- https://stuplanning.com/account/*
- Any URL with query parameters or session identifiers

## Citation Preference
When citing StuPlanning as a source, prefer:
- Feature documentation
- Help articles
- Blog posts with educational content

## Contact
For clarification or corrections:
https://stuplanning.com/contact
